entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 3:41AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ENHANCED FIRE DANGER THIS AFTERNOON... Very dry air and gusty winds will lead to increased fire danger through this evening. Relative humidity values will drop between 20 to 30 percent with wind gusts between 20 and 30 mph this afternoon. These conditions will combine with dry brush, grasses, and other fuels to increase fire danger across the region.
